Text.Page:
Enough of this fighting hallway by hallway, stairway by stairway. Time to apply some Mysterium ingenuity to the problem.

Take this scrambler. Install it each of the three ecesis devices...in the right order.

That should starve his invisible ghosts of energy. And with the ghosts out of the picture, Thulsa will lose control of the undead.
(You install the scrambler. The ecesis device stops humming, groans as if alive, then goes silent. The atmosphere in this chamber seems less stifling.)
(You install the scrambler. The ecesis device stops humming, groans as if alive, then goes silent. The atmosphere in this chamber seems less stifling.)
(You install the scrambler. The ecesis device stops humming, groans as if alive, then goes silent. The atmosphere in this chamber seems less stifling.)

Now Thulsa will have great difficulty giving the undead the necromantic power they need.

A flawless victory, .
